execution_plan.description: Find the goods (id) having the maximum price.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE price = (SELECT MAX(price) FROM goods);

execution_plan.description: Find all receipts that include the goods items identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Ordinal, Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get the receipt number and date for the receipts found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, Date FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);
